auth.signupSuccess: Sign up successful! You can now log in.
auth.signupError: An error occurred during sign up.

hero.ctaFinalSubtitle: Join thousands of professionals who have already transformed their job search with JobNexAI.

testimonials.name: Sophie Martin
testimonials.quote: Thanks to JobNexAI, I found a position that perfectly matched my skills in just 3 weeks. The CV analysis tool helped me optimize my profile for each application.

testimonials.name: Thomas Dubois
testimonials.quote: The smart matching system saved me a lot of time. I received alerts for jobs that truly matched my criteria, and I landed a job with a 15% higher salary than my previous one.

testimonials.name: Léa Bernard
testimonials.quote: The application tracking is incredibly convenient. I could see at a glance where I was in my process, and the automatic reminders kept me from missing important interviews.

testimonials.name: Alexandre Petit
testimonials.quote: The market analysis gave me a significant advantage during salary negotiations. I was able to position myself confidently by knowing the industry trends.

testimonials.name: Julie Moreau
testimonials.quote: The integrated professional network allowed me to connect directly with recruiters. That's how I got my current job, without even applying through a traditional job post.

testimonials.name: Nicolas Lambert
testimonials.quote: The Pro subscription is really worth it. The advanced features helped me stand out and land several interviews at top companies.

steps.title: Create your profile
steps.description: Import your CV or create a new one with our intuitive tool. Our AI will analyze your skills and experience.

steps.title: Get personalized suggestions
steps.description: Our algorithm suggests job offers that match your profile, with a compatibility score for each position.

steps.title: Apply and track your applications
steps.description: Apply directly from the platform and track the progress of all your applications in a centralized dashboard.

hero.title: The all-in-one platform for jobs
hero.subtitle: JobNexAI connects candidates, freelancers, and recruiters using AI. Find the ideal job, land projects, or recruit the best talents with ease.
featureDescriptions: Our AI algorithm analyzes your profile and available positions to suggest the most relevant jobs with a compatibility score.
Create a professional, ATS-optimized CV with our sleek templates and personalized improvement tips.
Track all your applications in one place, with automatic reminders for interviews and follow-ups.
Access real-time data on salaries, in-demand skills, and job market trends.
Receive personalized job suggestions based on your skills, experience, and preferences.
Connect with other professionals, exchange messages, and grow your network directly from the platform.
hero.ctaSubtitle: Join thousands of professionals who have already transformed their job search with JobNexAI.

subtitle: Let AI power your search. From CV optimization to automated applications, JobNexAI streamlines your path to the perfect position or the best freelance opportunities.
